title.narrative: Identification of existing and new value chain actors

description.narrative: One of the main objectives of the workshops organised in March 2018 in the four project countries was to start the process of identifying the main actors involved in the selected value chains. Following a participatory process, the participants to the workshops identified importers, exporters, processors and farmers' groups. This process is developed during the stakeholder analysis conducted within Output 1, is continued by the local communicators and will be taken over by the value chain coaches. The relevant stakeholder categories will continue to be updated in order to keep track of new or developing actors.
